vocabInfos.mediumDef:
A man living at the time of the Patriarchs, only mentioned at Gen.22.24;
son of: Nahor (H5152H) and Reumah (H7208);
brother of: Tebah (H2875), Gaham (H1514) and Maacah (H4601);
half-brother of: Uz (H5780H), Buz (H0938), Kemuel (H7055), Chesed (H3777), Hazo (H2375), Pildash (H6394), Jidlaph (H3044), Bethuel (H1328A)
§ Thahash = "dugong"
son of Nahor by his concubine Reumah and nephew of Abraham
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition:
他轄 这个陽性專有名詞 人名在原文的意思是 "懦艮"
拿鶴和他的妾流瑪所生的兒子, 亞伯拉罕的侄子 (創 22:24)
vocabInfos._zh_Definition:
他辖 这个阳性专有名词 人名在原文的意思是 "懦艮"
拿鹤和他的妾流玛所生的儿子, 亚伯拉罕的侄子 (创 22:24)
